title: Now You Can Airbnb Your Own Field Of Dreams (Podcast)
itunes:title: Now You Can Airbnb Your Own Field Of Dreams (Podcast)
description:
Jason Kelly, Michael Barr and Mike Lynch discuss the latest in the business of sports, including the Pensacola Blue Wahoos plan to post their stadium on Airbnb. We find out exactly how the crew would spend a night in their personal field of dreams. We also discuss Major Leagues Soccer's return to play tournament in Orlando and the financial challenges NCAA athletic departments face this fall. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
